scripts.write-translations:all: yarn write-translations --locale ar && yarn write-translations --locale bn && yarn write-translations --locale cs && yarn write-translations --locale da && yarn write-translations --locale de && yarn write-translations --locale el && yarn write-translations --locale en && yarn write-translations --locale es && yarn write-translations --locale fi && yarn write-translations --locale fr && yarn write-translations --locale he && yarn write-translations --locale hi && yarn write-translations --locale hu && yarn write-translations --locale id && yarn write-translations --locale it && yarn write-translations --locale ja && yarn write-translations --locale ko && yarn write-translations --locale nl && yarn write-translations --locale nb && yarn write-translations --locale pl && yarn write-translations --locale pt && yarn write-translations --locale ro && yarn write-translations --locale ru && yarn write-translations --locale sk && yarn write-translations --locale sv && yarn write-translations --locale ta && yarn write-translations --locale th && yarn write-translations --locale tr && yarn write-translations --locale zh-Hans && yarn write-translations --locale zh-Hant
scripts.worker:all: tsc --project scripts --outDir scripts/release && node -r dotenv/config --experimental-modules scripts/release/worker.mjs
scripts.translate:cli: tsc --project scripts --outDir scripts/dist && node -r dotenv/config --experimental-modules scripts/dist/translate-cli.mjs
